citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 PM on
24-Oct-17.
Knocked on house door. Called phone number provided. The licensee was not available due to a doctors
appointment.
